page.title: 18Shooting Range Complaints
page.content: Between Scalford and Wycomb there is{a {Clay Pigeon Shooting Range}set up about 12 years ago. The local owner has been given a licence for this only yearly.Shooting used to take place once a week, but in the last few years the range has been used twice a week and for longer hours. So some of the local people, especially{Wycomb residents,}have been trying to have the{range closed down because of the{noise.}At the same time The{owner}has been asking for a{longer {licence}so that he could develop the site for{International matches. } The argument has caused many quarrels and much unhappiness in the villages. In May 1985 the{Melton District {Council}decided the{range must close, but time given to find a new site, not easy after the recent publicity.
